SEARCH
Package com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models

Class EventsTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.tundra_snow_app.Models.EventsTest
public class EventsTest extends Object
EventsTest is a JUnit test class for the Events class. It tests the default constructor, parameterized constructor, and getter and setter methods.
